meanings.definition: A type of marine fish known for their slimy bodies and scavenging habits.
meanings.sent1: Hagfishes are slimy creatures that live in the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study hagfishes to learn more about marine life.
meanings.sent3: The hagfishes had a party in the slimy seaweed.
meanings.sent4: The market was as chaotic as a tank of hagfishes.
meanings.sent5: The aquarium visitors were amazed by the hagfishes' slippery bodies.

meanings.definition: The plural form of hagfish, referring to multiple individuals of this species.
meanings.sent1: A group of hagfishes swam together in the deep sea.
meanings.sent2: The fishermen caught many hagfishes in their nets.
meanings.sent3: The hagfishes organized a parade to celebrate their sliminess.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was a sea of hagfishes, each with its own unique slime.
meanings.sent5: The market was bustling with vendors selling hagfishes to eager customers.
